description: Auto-incrementing surrogate primary key.

comments: NULL values are allowed to support legacy data, but are not recommended.

description: A number used to identify a unit in a catalog.
Auto-incrementing surrogate primary key.

A number assigned by the collector to the collecting event, this might be called a field number or a station number or a collector number. The number applies to all the material collected during that same event.
